mapper.select: SELECT B.BOOK_NO , B.MEMBER_NO , M.NAME as memberName , B.BOOK_PLACE , B.START_DATE , B.END_DATE , B.BOOK_PURPOSE , B.BOOK_DATE , B.UPDATE_DATE , B.CANCEL_DATE FROM BOOK B JOIN MEMBER M ON B.MEMBER_NO = M.NO WHERE CANCEL_DATE IS NULL ORDER BY BOOK_NO DESC

choose.when: SELECT BOOK_NO , MEMBER_NO , BOOK_PLACE , START_DATE , END_DATE , BOOK_PURPOSE , BOOK_DATE , UPDATE_DATE , CANCEL_DATE FROM BOOK WHERE START_DATE >= #{startDate} AND END_DATE <= #{endDate} ORDER BY BOOK_NO DESC
choose.otherwise: SELECT BOOK_NO , MEMBER_NO , BOOK_PLACE , START_DATE , END_DATE , BOOK_PURPOSE , BOOK_DATE , UPDATE_DATE , CANCEL_DATE FROM BOOK ORDER BY BOOK_NO DESC

mapper.select: SELECT BOOK_NO , MEMBER_NO , BOOK_PLACE , START_DATE , END_DATE , BOOK_PURPOSE , BOOK_DATE , UPDATE_DATE , CANCEL_DATE FROM BOOK WHERE BOOK_NO = #{bookNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE BOOK SET CANCEL_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE BOOK_NO = #{bookNo}
